summary: Completed frontend testing after Select component fix. Core functionality working well - products page filters, multi-currency toggle, admin dashboard stats, and navigation all functional. Session management issues prevent full cart/checkout testing.

ui_bugs.issue: User sessions expire frequently, causing redirects to login page
ui_bugs.details: Users get logged out after short periods, interrupting cart and admin workflows

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete full cart testing due to session expiration
Checkout redirects to login when cart is empty or session expired

passed_tests: Fixed Select components (sort, category, brand, condition filters)
Multi-currency toggle (KES, USD, EUR) on products page
Admin dashboard stats display (8 stat cards)
Product catalog display with proper images and pricing
Responsive design on mobile and desktop viewports
action_item_for_main_agent: Improve session management to prevent frequent logouts. This is blocking comprehensive testing of cart operations, checkout flow, and admin CRUD operations. Consider implementing longer session timeouts or better session refresh mechanisms.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core functionality works, session issues prevent full testing)
